statement.p: In 64.52 of the last 31 days it rained. How many days did it not rain? days

solution.p: We recall that a percent as a decimal is part/whole. Here that is \displaystyle\frac{{P}}{{31}}={0.6452}. We solve for P by multiplying by \displaystyle{31}. \displaystyle{P}={0.6452}\cdot{31}={20.0012}. This is the number of days that it rained. We want the non-rainy days which is 31-20.0012=10.9988 We round that as requested to 11.
